Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kansas City Royals clinched a playoff spot in the American League for the first time since 2015.
Others: The Royals went a terrible 56-106 last season, finishing as one of the worst teams in all of baseball.
Over the offseason, the Royals made several key signings and trades to improve their roster.
The Royals are currently tied with the Detroit Tigers for the second/third wild card spot.
